short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows screen sharing for video conversations on the Whtson platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whtson Screen Sharing is an add-on to the Whtson Meeting app in Whtson.com allowing you to share your screen or active applications in an ongoing conference call.

Read more at the FAQ in whtson.com
